Education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Software Engineering
Bachelor of Technology in Information and Communication Technology

responsibilities: Created and sustained an interactive web portal featuring embedded Power BI reports with C#, .NET MVC, and JavaScript; enhanced data accessibility leading to a 40% increase in daily active users over six months.

Directed the entire project lifecycle, from database design to backend code development and user interface creation; streamlined processes that enhanced overall project delivery speed by 30% for future iterations.
Created an easy-to-use landing page for the portal to help users quickly find different reports.
Engineered high-performance stored procedures in Microsoft SQL Server to optimize complex queries, reducing execution time from two seconds to less than one second for critical daily operations.
Designed a comprehensive auditing platform, where users could manually upload reports and screenshots for checking code quality and architecture compliance.

Streamlined the release process for every two weeks, verifying operational excellence and adherence to established coding standards; contributed to an increase in overall system stability by addressing critical bugs ahead of rollout.
Worked on fixing bugs by troubleshooting issues and making improvements to enhance system efficiency.
